description:
Tree Preservation Application At:

355 Liverpool Road, Islington, London, N1 1NL

TPO Reference:

T6 – Lime of LBI TPO (No.1) 1968
T4 – Oak of LBI TPO (No.6) 1976

PO Number:

T090004

Work specifications:
 
1 x Lime (T 6) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.1) 1968

Reduce the lowest stem (formed from the basal growth) growing towards the front of the frontage of 355 + 357 to give up to 4m clearance from the property. Retain lateral screening.
Remove remaining basal growth.
Remove low epicomic growth up to crown break while retaining the lateral screening as directed by the owner.
Prune back from the street lamp column to give up to 2m clearence and the front of No.355 to give up to 3m clearance.
Remove deadwood and inspect crown.


1 x Oak (T4) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.6) 1976.

Lift over the garden of 353 + 355 to a height of up to 7m.
Reduce the lateral limb growing over the garden of 353 by 20 % and shape into the crown line.
Remove the low branches encroaching on the rear boundary wall to give a clearance of 1m from the wall.
Remove deadwood
